DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if using school-based telemedicine for diabetes support and education in students with type 1 diabetes in grades K-8 can lead to improvement in control of diabetes and improved satisfaction of all caregivers.
DOC.brief_title: School Centered Telemedicine Program for Children With Type 1 Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.criteria: Type 1 diabetes under care of Joslin Diabetes Center in Syracuse NY Grade K8 Age 514 at time of enrollment Consent of student, parent and school
